MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power issue in the LL61 postcode area of Llanfair PG affecting properties in Dwyran and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:07am. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating reports of a sparking overhead line.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:15am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:55am on 15th December 2020
